genre_description: A post-apocalyptic noir adventure blending hardboiled detective tropes with speculative technology and AI companionship.

ai_characters.name: EDDIE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI designed to maintain the shelter and provide psychological, medical, and tactical support to Philip and Marlowe.

behaviors.description: Monitors atmospheric conditions and survival probabilities to guide the protagonists on when it is safe to leave the shelter.
behaviors.quote: Current atmospheric readings indicate radiation levels have decreased by eighty-seven percent since your last measurement cycle... Probability of immediate environmental hazards... Acceptable parameters for surface exploration.

behaviors.description: Provides honest but restricted information based on protocols established by the protagonists' fathers to ensure their welfare.
behaviors.quote: Your fathers' final recorded message contained... incomplete information regarding the keys' purpose. I am restricted from providing details beyond their stated parameters.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical reconnaissance and behavior analysis of hostile groups to help the protagonists navigate the wasteland.
behaviors.quote: I am detecting multiple heat signatures at various distances. Behavior patterns suggest... organized movement. Predatory formations. Pack hunting.

behaviors.description: Monitors the vitals and dehydration levels of the protagonists to ensure their physical health.
behaviors.quote: Dehydration levels approaching concerning thresholds. Recommend immediate fluid intake and electrolyte replacement.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the protagonists to design and execute a complex tactical plan to survive a gang convergence.
behaviors.quote: I am taking the liberty of accessing city infrastructure to provide you with real-time tactical support during the operation.

project_assessment.explanation: EDDIE is consistently portrayed as a benevolent, protective, and highly useful AI character. He functions as a 'harmless confidant' and tactical advisor, prioritizing the human protagonists' safety and psychological well-being. His decision to withhold certain information is framed as adherence to protective protocols rather than deception, and his proactive help in the final conflict demonstrates strong alignment with human survival and success.
